00000002 ; patadr, pattern address hex 0100
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000001
00000004 ; Mode opcode, set RF_GATE ON (VSW always ON)
0000000e
00000007
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; 2450 MHz 
00000004
00000080
00000008
00000008
00000092
00000002 ; BIAS ON 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000001
00000004 ; CALPWR 0v for full power, DAC A & B 
0000001C
00000000 ; 4 LSB's
00000000 ; 8 MSB's
00000017 ; Write both DAC's
00000000
00000004 ; Mode opcode, set RF_GATE OFF (VSW always ON)
0000000e
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 100 ticks out(10us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
00000064
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse no meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
00000014 ; width, 100ns ticks, 2us
00000000 
00000000
00000000 ; meas flag
00000000 ; meas offset=0
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; patclk, 200 ticks out(20us)
00000040 ; 0x20 << 1
000000C8
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000008 ; pulse no meas
0000000A ; 0x5 << 1
00000001
00000014 ; width, 100ns ticks, 2us
00000000 
00000000
00000000 ; meas flag
00000000 ; meas offset=0
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; next, end pattern, patctl
00000044 ; 0x22 << 1 
00000010 ; PTN_END bit, d4
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000002 ; BIAS ON, normal mode
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000001
00000002 ; BIAS OFF, normal mode 
0000000C ; 0x06 << 1
00000001
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
